entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
